channel.title: Text Analytics on r-tastic

item.title: Yuval Harari reviews - sentiment analysis
item.description: So! Following my previous blog post where I scraped Amazon reviews of Yuval Harari’s Sapiens to create a wordcloud based on them, here I will compare results of sentiment analysis performed on Harari’s two books: Sapiens and Homo Deus. A QUICK INTRO For the context, Sapiens has been published originally in Hebrew in 2011. It, as Wikipedia puts it, [Sapiens] surveys the history of humankind from the evolution of archaic human species in the Stone Age up to the twenty-first century.
